TitleEnglish: One Piece: The Desert Princess and the Pirates: Adventure in Alabasta
SummaryEnglish: Going Merry, pushing the ground line. There was also Vivi, the princess of the kingdom of Alabasta, which is said to be a desert nation. The kingdom of Alabasta was on the verge of collapse due to the darkness of the evil secret society, but Vivi knew that the root of all evil was the hero of the country, Crocodile.
